BULK_ACTIONS.CAPTION: Actions

PUBLISHED.NONE: None of the selected events need to be retracted before they can be deleted.
PUBLISHED.WARNING: The events below cannot be deleted as they have already been published and deleting them would leave no way to delete the published files. Instead choose a workflow below to retract the events first and then delete them.

UNPUBLISHED.NONE: None of the selected events can be deleted without leaving orphan files.

BULK_ACTIONS.DELETE_EVENTS_WARNING_LINE1: Once deleted, all event metadata, audio and video files will be deleted and be unrecoverable.
BULK_ACTIONS.DELETE_SERIES_WARNING_LINE1: Once deleted, all series metadata will be unrecoverable. Events in the series will not be deleted.

GENERAL.CANNOTSTART: Highlighted event(s) cannot be processed at the moment. Deselect it/them or try again later.

RETRACT.CAPTION: Retract Event
RETRACT.WARNING: This event has been published to at least one publication channel so it has to be retracted before it can be deleted. Select from the tasks below to retract the publictions.

RECIPIENTS.AUDIT_TRAIL_DESCRIPTION: Check to add the message to the audit trail

NON_SEGMENTABLE.DETAIL: The file contains a recording of a person speaking to an audience.

MULTIPLE_PARTS.DETAIL: A set of files containing different parts of the event.

LOCKED.RUNNING: Editing metadata is not allowed when operations are running on an event

BUMPER.CAPTION: Bumper (begin)
BUMPER.DESCRIPTION: Predefined video that is appended to the beginning of a recording.

TRAILER.CAPTION: Bumper (end)
TRAILER.DESCRIPTION: Predefined video that is appended to the end of a recording.

TITLE.CAPTION: Title
TITLE.DESCRIPTION: Predefined slide including descriptive metadata appended to the beginning or end of a recording.

WATERMARK.CAPTION: Watermark
WATERMARK.DESCRIPTION: Semi-transparent image that is overlaid on every frame of the recording.
